reviewText: Not quite what I expected, but it was interesting.
Excellent. Part of an terrific trilogy by Steven Greer.  Get the big picture.

In order to appreciate this DVD, one must have already read the books by Dr. Steven Greer. Also, if you usually watch the night sky, you will appreciate this documentary! Makes me wish I had been there!!
Gave this item as a gift. The person I gave it to did not let me know if he liked it ot not

This DVD shows what is described on the book Contact: Countdown to transformation, and is not supposed to be a stand-alone DVD.
The DVD comes for free when you buy the book from Disclosure Project's official website.

If you buy this DVD alone you won't like it because it's just a bunch of videos and sounds of ET contact, and since the it's supposed to be seen after the book is read or as you read it.

I experience being misled by what was written and what was offered in this DVD. It was extremely short and it had no real information, just some video of lights that were identified as et's. The disappointment comes also from admiring Steven Greer and his writings.
